sn9.3:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā kassapagotto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.3:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kassapagotto divāvihāragato aññataraṃ chetaṃ ovadati.
sn9.3:4.3: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmantaṃ kassapagottaṃ saṃvejetukāmā yenāyasmā kassapagotto tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.3:8.1: Atha kho āyasmā kassapagotto tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
